/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and grass, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. On the right side of the street, there's a serene body of water, reflecting the sky and adding depth to the image. In the distance, buildings can be seen, indicating the proximity of urban life. The image is captured in a 360-degree format, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
